title: Walk-in Guest with No Availability
description: A walk-in guest requests a room, but the hotel is sold out.

tasks.description: Check the PMS to confirm the hotel is sold out.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies there are no rooms available.

tasks.description: Politely inform the guest that the hotel is full.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent communicates the situation clearly and courteously.

tasks.description: As a courtesy, call a nearby partner hotel to check for their availability and offer to help the guest make a reservation there.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assists the guest in finding alternative accommodation, providing excellent service despite being unable to accommodate them.
